## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                       | Type                                             | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------ | ----------- |
| `option` | `option`  | Defines the style of the list.  The default setting is `classic`. | `"classic" \| "dropdown" \| "nav" \| "treeview"` | `"classic"` |
